languages.text: "Слова правды звучат как музыка. Так у нас говорят".
"The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."
languages.original_text: "Слова правды звучат как музыка. Так у нас говорят".

traits.locale_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

languages.text: “真理会发出音乐的声音，我的族人常常这么说。”
languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: “真理会发出音乐的声音，我的族人常常这么说。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

languages.text: «Las palabras de la verdad son música para los oídos. Eso es lo que dicen los míos».
languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: «Las palabras de la verdad son música para los oídos. Eso es lo que dicen los míos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「真実の言葉は音楽のように響く。我らに伝わる格言だ」
languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: 「真実の言葉は音楽のように響く。我らに伝わる格言だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Worte der Wahrheit klingen wie Musik. So sagt unser Volk."
languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte der Wahrheit klingen wie Musik. So sagt unser Volk."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « La vérité est aussi mélodieuse que la musique, comme le dit mon peuple. »
languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité est aussi mélodieuse que la musique, comme le dit mon peuple. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hakikatin sözleri, kulağa müzik gibi gelir. Halkımız böyle der."
languages.original_text: "The words of truth sound like music. This is what our people say."

traits.locale_text: "Hakikatin sözleri, kulağa müzik gibi gelir. Halkımızın bir deyişi..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
